story.label: Two guards drag an unconscious person across a dark prison hallway...
Warden: "Lock him up with the rest of the non workers."
An elderly female prisoner looks at the unconcious person who is bleeding.
Old woman: Oh poor boy... what have they done to you?
Why did they do this to you?      [Note: You are playing as the Prisoner]

NEG.label: Don't tell her
story: You: I don't want to talk about it.
You: They took my brother away.
They started beating me when I asked them where they were taking him.
I mean, he's just a little boy. What did he ever do to anybody?
This war has taken everything from me...
Old woman: I know it must be really tough for you.
You: I should go and look for him.
